Question
========
  
Researcher I expects an effect size of 0.55, researcher II expects an effect size of 0.40. Both test with a $\alpha$ = .05.

If both researchers draw a sample of size 100, which study achieves the greatest power?

  
Answerlist
----------
* The power is equal in both cases because the samples are of equal size.
* The power is equal in both cases because the samples used $\alpha$'s are equal.
* Research II
* Research I
